member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_FEATURE_LEVELS
member.summary: Describes info about the feature levels supported by the current graphics driver.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_FEATURE_LEVELS.NumFeatureLevels
member.summary: The number of feature levels in the array at pFeatureLevelsRequested.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_FEATURE_LEVELS.pFeatureLevelsRequested
member.summary: A pointer to an array of s that the application is requesting for the driver and hardware to evaluate.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_FEATURE_LEVELS.MaxSupportedFeatureLevel
member.summary: The maximum feature level that the driver and hardware support.
